Bexley – proposed joint outsourcing with Bromley dropped.
Bromley – proposed joint outsourcing with Bexley dropped. Will continue investigating outsourcing by itself.
Warwickshire – Police offer front of counter services in several libraries.
Bath and North East Somerset – 8.5 hours per week reduced opening overall.
Edinburgh – Consultation includes questions on volunteers/community groups doing more in libraries / more colocation / Open+.
Northamptonshire – Now run by First for Wellbeing (community interest company focusing on integrated wellbeing inc. health, libraries, parks]
Birmingham – Library of Birmingham Trust, set up to seek philanthropy, fails and is closed.
Herefordshire – Belmont Library to become volunteer. Halo Leisure Trust to take over Bromyard Library. Council customer services only at Hereford Central Library.
North Lanarkshire – Old Monkland and Petersburn Libraries close at end of October.
North Somerset – Congresbury Library to be run, and paid for, by parish council, with volunteers.
Birmingham – 2 libraries (Aston and Sutton Coldfield) to close: 24 job losses. £1.4m cut 2016/17 followed by £1.95m in 2017/18.
